Keywords: Battleworld: Other , Fantastic Four , Latveria , Ruler
Real Name: Susan Storm
Special Powers
TARGETING: Hindering
FORM THE NEW FANTASTIC FOUR: At the beginning of the game, you may replace up to 4 friendly characters with the same number of characters from your Sideline on their starting clicks. All replacement and replaced characters must have the Fantastic Four keyword and different names. The total points of the replacement characters can't exceed the total points of the replaced characters.
MERCY AT THE LEFT HAND OF DOOM: Barrier. Barrier as FREE, but only to generate 2 markers. // Sue Storm may use her displayed attack and damage powers as if she occupied a square of her Barrier markers.
QUEEN OF BATTLEWORLD: Leadership, Perplex. When Sue Storm uses Perplex to target another character with a Battleworld keyword, you may instead modify a combat value except damage by +2 or -2.

May 21, 2021
Goop
She can do a lot of cool stuff, especially using those powers from where her barrier markers are placed, pretty much giving you 12 range on some of those abilities. Also the +2 perplex that is likely used for her to back up her Battleworld chase kids. Ultimately though she is mostly a 100pt support piece that can do a bit of backup attacking. Not sure if she will still be able to use quake and incap from marker under the new 2021 rules though.
